extensionDescription.message: Drag to preview links or search selected text

closeWhenFocusedInitialWindow.message: Close popup when origin window is focused

tryOpenAtMousePosition.message: Try to open at mouse position (disabled â€” open at screen center)

disabledUrls.message: Disable on these URLs (via plain text, regex, wildcarks, one per line)

sendPageBack.message: Send Page Back to Original Window

blurEnabled.message: Set blur effect on Original Window when popup

enableContainerIdentify.message: Keep open in the same container as original page

modifiedKey.message: Response when selected key is pressing (Please check if it works as expected.)

rememberPopupSizeAndPosition.message: Persist popup size and position, ignoring below settings

closedByEsc.message: Press Esc to close the current popup page (overrides page's default Esc behavior)

dragPx.message: At least move px (do not check if 0):

urlCheck.message: Open directly if selected is url

doubleTapKeyToSendPageBack.message: Double tap on specific key to send page back to original window (Please check if it works as expected.)

hoverDisabledUrls.message: Disable on these URLs (via plain text, regex, wildcarks, one per line)

triggerAfterDragRelease.message: Trigger after drag is released. (no directions check if uncheck)
